author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: A critical flaw in LangChain Core could allow attackers to steal sensitive secrets and manipulate LLM responses via prompt injection. LangChain Core (langchain-core) is a key Python package in the LangChain ecosystem that provides core interfaces and model-agnostic tools for building LLM-based applications. A critical vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2025-68664 (CVSS score of 9.3), affects the […]
title: LangChain core vulnerability allows prompt injection and data exposure

author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: An NPM package with over 56,000 downloads stole WhatsApp credentials, hid its activity, and installed a backdoor. Koi Security researchers warned that the NPM package ‘Lotusbail’, a WhatsApp Web API library and fork of ‘Baileys’, has been stealing users’ credentials and data. The package has been available for six months and has had over 56,000 […]
title: NPM package with 56,000 downloads compromises WhatsApp accounts
